summary: This bill, the Further Additional Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act of 2025, extends various programs and funding measures. It provides additional appropriations, including funds for disaster relief, the Office of Navajo and Hopi Relocation, and a payment to a deceased Representative's beneficiary. It extends funding for community health centers, the National Health Service Corps, special diabetes programs, and various national health security initiatives.  It also extends several Medicare and Medicaid provisions and addresses matters related to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, cybersecurity, and public safety.
